word:
I am very thankful today that I believe the Lord is present in this very assembly to accept this ordinance of marriage, and we thank you all that are here that you are present. We want to say to every one of you, There is a very great and a very grand work before us. We cannot discern it now. Time steals on, steals on so gradually, and the 


                    -272- 

powers of darkness, like a thief, are watching their chance, that they may make all the evil possible.
